EmailTemplate.description: Sent when CS customer signs up for Recurring Billing
EmailTemplate.name: CS Recurring Payments
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Community Solar Bills are now on Auto-Pay
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Hello {!Account.Name},
Thank you for signing up for automatic billing with BlueWave Community Solar!
You will continue to receive your monthly bill via email and your payments will be made automatically. If you ever have any questions about your bill or if you would like to opt out of automatic billing, please log in to your portal or give us a call at 844.786.4100.
Thanks for joining us to make ‘Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality. - All of us here at BlueWave P.S. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or (844) 786 - 4100. We’re happy to help.
